scripts.dev:sqlite: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local next dev
scripts.dev:mysql: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.mysql.prisma && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local next dev
scripts.build:sqlite: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local next build
scripts.build:mysql: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.mysql.prisma && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local next build
